titleStmt.title: Sylvia's complaint of her sexes unhappiness a poem : being the second part of Sylvia's revenge, or, A satyr against man.
titleStmt.author: Ames, Richard, d. 1693.
Gould, Robert, d. 1709?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Ames: Cf. BM; Halkett and Laing (2nd ed.). Erroneously assigned to Robert Gould. Cf. Sloane, E.H. Robert Gould.
This item appears at reel 298:25 as Wing S6333 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and as Wing A2992A at reel 1734:15.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
